pages.text: A Christmas Forest is a snowy biome with decorated christmas trees. Reindeers can spawn there and snow won't melt when near a light source.
A christmas tree with a reindeer.

pages.title: Reindeer
pages.text: Reindeers can spawn in christmas forests. It might not be a good idea to hit one.
This star can occasionally be found on trees in a Christmas Forest. It can be used as decoration.
